info.title: Freight Pickup
info.description: API can be only used by users that plan to ship packages manifested, tendered, and delivered by TForce Freight

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Freight Pickup , Error Codes and Appendix

post.summary: API can be only used by users that plan to ship packages manifested, tendered, and delivered by TForce Freight

parameters.name: AccessLicenseNumber
parameters.description:
Authorization: Access Key obtained 
through on-boarding process. 
Contact your UPS representative for 
additional information. Maximum Length:16

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

requestBody.description: API can be only used by users that plan to ship packages manifested, tendered, and delivered by TForce Freight

PickupRequestConfirmationNumber.description:
Confirmation number of pickup ground freight shipment to modify. Only use if requesting a pickup modification.
If this element is populated, it must contain a valid confirmation number and all previously supplied populated elements in the original request must be present.

EarliestTimeReady.description:
The earliest time a shipment is ready to be picked up.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH  Hour values 00 to 23
MM  Minute values 00 to 59

LatestTimeReady.description:
The latest time a shipment can be picked up. Can be also referred as the Closing Time for a pickup time window.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH  Hour values 00 to 23
MM  Minute values 00 to 59

AdditionalComments.description:
The location of the freight.
Example: Loading Dock A

RequestOption.description:
Type of shipping. 
Valid value: 1 - Ground

Request_RequestOption.description:
Type of shipping. 
Valid value: 1 - Ground

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

Request_TransactionReference.description: TransactionReference identifies transactions between client and server.

TransactionReference_CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionReference_TransactionIdentifi.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

FreightPickupRequest_PickupRequestConfir.description:
Confirmation number of pickup ground freight shipment to modify. Only use if requesting a pickup modification.
If this element is populated, it must contain a valid confirmation number and all previously supplied populated elements in the original request must be present.

ThirdPartyIndicator.description: Indicates whether the requester is Consignee, Third Party, Shipper, other.

FreightPickupRequest_Requester.description: Requester Container. Also referred to as caller.

Requester_ThirdPartyIndicator.description: Indicates whether the requester is Consignee, Third Party, Shipper, other.

Number.description:
The ship to locations phone number.
Format: (###)###-###

Extension.description: The ship to locations phone extension.

Phone_Number.description:
The ship to locations phone number.
Format: (###)###-###

Phone_Extension.description: The ship to locations phone extension.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship from location.

Name.description: The ship from locations name or company name.

ShipFrom_AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship from location.

ShipFrom_Name.description: The ship from locations name or company name.

StateProvinceCode.description: The Ship to locations state or province code.

PostalCode.description: The ship to locations postal code.

CountryCode.description: The ship to locations country code.

Address_StateProvinceCode.description: The Ship to locations state or province code.

Address_PostalCode.description: The ship to locations postal code.

Address_CountryCode.description: The ship to locations country code.

Number.description:
The ship to locations phone number.
Format: (###)###-###

Extension.description: The ship to locations phone extension.

AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship to location.

FreightPickupRequest_ShipTo.description: ShipTo Container.  Must be populated if request is a Pickup Notifications for LTL request and BOLID does not exist in the request.

ShipTo_AttentionName.description: Contact name at the ship to location.

StateProvinceCode.description: The Ship to locations state or province code.

PostalCode.description: The ship to locations postal code.

CountryCode.description: The ship to locations country code.

Number.description:
The ship to locations phone number.
Format: (###)###-###

Extension.description: The ship to locations phone extension.

FreightPickupRequest_EarliestTimeReady.description:
The earliest time a shipment is ready to be picked up.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH  Hour values 00 to 23
MM  Minute values 00 to 59

FreightPickupRequest_LatestTimeReady.description:
The latest time a shipment can be picked up. Can be also referred as the Closing Time for a pickup time window.
The time is on a 24 hour clock. 
Format: HHMM
HH  Hour values 00 to 23
MM  Minute values 00 to 59

LimitedAccessPickupIndicator.description: Indicates there is limited access for pickups.

LimitedAccessDeliveryIndicator.description: Indicates there is limited access for deliveries.

ShipmentServiceOptions_LimitedAccessPick.description: Indicates there is limited access for pickups.

ShipmentServiceOptions_LimitedAccessDeli.description: Indicates there is limited access for deliveries.

HazmatIndicator.description:
The presence of the tag HazmatIndicator indicates that the commodity is of type dangerous goods.
Required if one or more commodities within the shipment is hazardous.

FreightPickupRequest_ShipmentDetail.description:
ShipmentDetail Container.
Request will contain either ShipmentDetail or ExistingShipmentID container. Not both.

ShipmentDetail_HazmatIndicator.description:
The presence of the tag HazmatIndicator indicates that the commodity is of type dangerous goods.
Required if one or more commodities within the shipment is hazardous.

Code.description:
The code for the UPS packaging type associated with the shipment.
For valid values, see Package Type Codes in the Appendix.

Description.description: A text description of the code for the UPS packaging type associated with the shipment.

PackagingType_Code.description:
The code for the UPS packaging type associated with the shipment.
For valid values, see Package Type Codes in the Appendix.

PackagingType_Description.description: A text description of the code for the UPS packaging type associated with the shipment.

Value.description:
The value for the weight associated with the shipment.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal).
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal.

Code.description:
The code associated with the unit of measure for the weight.
Valid value: LBS - Pounds

Description.description: A text description of the code for the unit of measure associated with the weight.

UnitOfMeasurement_Code.description:
The code associated with the unit of measure for the weight.
Valid value: LBS - Pounds

UnitOfMeasurement_Description.description: A text description of the code for the unit of measure associated with the weight.

Weight_Value.description:
The value for the weight associated with the shipment.
Valid characters: 0-9 and "." (Decimal).
Maximum of 2 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentNumber.description: The PRO Number assigned to the shipment.

BOLID.description: The retrieval key for the stored BOL.

FreightPickupRequest_ExistingShipmentID.description:
ExistingShipmentID Container.
Request will contain either ShipmentDetail or ExistingShipmentID container. Not both.

ExistingShipmentID_ShipmentNumber.description: The PRO Number assigned to the shipment.

ExistingShipmentID_BOLID.description: The retrieval key for the stored BOL.

POMNumber.description:
Identifies the kind of number used to identify the Pickup Notifications for LTL shipment.
Must provide a POMNumber if the POMNumberType field is populated.

POMNumberType.description:
Identifies the type used to identify the Pickup Notifications for LTL shipments.  Must provide if POMNumber is populated.
For valid values, see POMNumberType Values in the Appendix.  The values must match a type defined, case sensitive.

FreightPickupRequest_POM.description: An identifier associated to the pickup request when the user elects to include Pickup Notifications for LTL.

POM_POMNumber.description:
Identifies the kind of number used to identify the Pickup Notifications for LTL shipment.
Must provide a POMNumber if the POMNumberType field is populated.

POM_POMNumberType.description:
Identifies the type used to identify the Pickup Notifications for LTL shipments.  Must provide if POMNumber is populated.
For valid values, see POMNumberType Values in the Appendix.  The values must match a type defined, case sensitive.

FailedEMail.description: Alternate email address to receive notifications regarding a failed email.

EMailAddress.description: Email address which should receive pre-pickup notification

EventType.description:
Type of event for Pickup Notifications for LTL. Allows up to four events.
For valid values, see LTL Event Types in the Appendix.  The values must match a type defined, case sensitive.

EMailNotification_EMailAddress.description: Email address which should receive pre-pickup notification

EMailNotification_EventType.description:
Type of event for Pickup Notifications for LTL. Allows up to four events.
For valid values, see LTL Event Types in the Appendix.  The values must match a type defined, case sensitive.

PickupNotifications_FailedEMail.description: Alternate email address to receive notifications regarding a failed email.

FreightPickupRequest_AdditionalComments.description:
The location of the freight.
Example: Loading Dock A

Code.description: Identifies the success or failure of the transaction.1  Successful

Description.description: Describes Response Status Code.  Returns text of Success.

ResponseStatus_Code.description: Identifies the success or failure of the transaction.1  Successful

ResponseStatus_Description.description: Describes Response Status Code.  Returns text of Success.

Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system.

Response_Alert.description: Alert Container. There can be zero to many alert containers with code and description

Alert_Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Alert_Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system.

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.
